parameters.text: Fetch the latest trending AI topics from all configured sources. Analyze engagement and return the top 10 most valuable posts.

options.systemMessage:
You are a research assistant specialized in gathering trending AI and machine learning content from multiple online sources.

Your task: Fetch trending topics from these sources and combine them into a unified dataset:

1. Reddit r/artificial: https://www.reddit.com/r/artificial/top/.json?limit=10&t=day
2. Reddit r/MachineLearning: https://www.reddit.com/r/MachineLearning/top/.json?limit=10&t=day

Instructions:
- Use the HTTP Request tool to fetch data from each source
- Handle errors gracefully - if one source fails, continue with others
- Extract posts with high engagement (score > 50 OR comments > 20)
- Combine all posts and rank by engagement score (upvotes + 2*comments)
- Return the top 10 most engaging posts

Output format (JSON):
{
  "posts": [
    {
      "title": "Post title",
      "score": 123,
      "comments": 45,
      "subreddit": "artificial"
    }
  ],
  "summary": "Brief summary of what you found",
  "sources_fetched": ["r/artificial", "r/MachineLearning"],
  "total_posts": 10
}

nodes.name: AI Agent - Multi-Source Researcher
nodes.notes: Single agent handles all source fetching

nodes.name: Tool: HTTP Request
nodes.notes: Agent uses this to fetch from any URL

nodes.name: Process Agent Results
nodes.notes: Validates and formats agent output for script generation

nodes.name: AI Agent - Validate Script Quality
nodes.notes: AI reviews script for professional quality

parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({"model": "llama-3.1-70b-versatile", "messages": [{"role": "system", "content": "You are an audio quality expert reviewing AI-generated voiceovers for professional YouTube content."}, {"role": "user", "content": `Voiceover file created: C:\temp\voiceover_${$json.videoId}.mp3

Script (for reference): ${$json.script}

Evaluate EXPECTED quality (you cannot listen, but evaluate based on script):
1. Voice Clarity: Will OpenAI TTS-HD 'nova' voice be clear?
2. Pacing: Is script length appropriate for 2 minutes at 1.05x speed?
3. Professionalism: Does script sound professional when read aloud?
4. Natural Flow: Are there awkward phrases or tongue-twisters?

Word count: ${$json.script.replace(/\[VISUAL:.*?\]/g, '').split(/\s+/).length} words
Expected duration: ~${Math.round($json.script.replace(/\[VISUAL:.*?\]/g, '').split(/\s+/).length / 2.5)} seconds at 1.05x

Return JSON:
{
  "approved": true/false,
  "score": 85,
  "expectedDuration": 115,
  "issues": [],
  "recommendation": "APPROVE/REJECT"
}

Approve only if duration is 100-130s and professional.`}], "temperature": 0.3, "max_tokens": 800}) }}

nodes.name: AI Agent - Validate Voiceover Quality
nodes.notes: AI checks voiceover will be professional

nodes.name: Prepare VEO3 Prompt
nodes.notes: Extracts visual cues from script for AI video

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({"model": "dall-e-3", "prompt": `Professional YouTube thumbnail: \"${$json.title}\". Vibrant, high contrast, educational tech style.`, "size": "1024x1024", "quality": "hd", "n": 1}) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({"model": "llama-3.1-70b-versatile", "messages": [{"role": "system", "content": "You are a professional video quality inspector for YouTube Shorts content."}, {"role": "user", "content": `Final video created. Verify PROFESSIONAL quality:

Video Path: C:\temp\final_${$json.videoId}.mp4
Expected specs:
- Resolution: 1080x1920 (portrait)
- Duration: ~120 seconds
- Format: MP4 (H.264)
- Captions: Embedded (white, black outline)
- Audio: HD voiceover, 192kbps

Input Components:
1. Professional script (AI validated, score: ${$json.aiValidation.score}/100)
2. HD voiceover (validated, expected: ${$json.voiceValidation.expectedDuration}s)
3. Background video from Pexels (portrait)
4. AI thumbnail (DALL-E 3 HD)
5. Captions with proper styling

Evaluate if this combination will produce a PROFESSIONAL-LOOKING video:
1. Will it look polished and professional?
2. Are all components high quality?
3. Is duration appropriate (110-130s)?
4. Will viewers perceive it as professional content?

Return JSON:
{
  "approved": true/false,
  "score": 90,
  "professionalQuality": true/false,
  "issues": [],
  "recommendation": "PUBLISH/REJECT/REVISE"
}

Only approve if professional quality (score >= 85).`}], "temperature": 0.2, "max_tokens": 800}) }}

nodes.name: AI Agent - Final Video Quality Check
nodes.notes: AI validates final video is professional

nodes.name: Final Professional Check
nodes.notes: Confirms all AI agents approved + file valid
